title.rendered: Aer Lingus Airlines Offers Dublin and London Package

content.rendered:
Aer Lingus

Aer Lingus (Airlines) was established in 15 April 1936, commenced operations in 27 May 1936. Aer Lingus is the flag carrier airline of Ireland and the second-largest airline in Ireland. Founded by the Irish government, it was privatised between 2006 and 2015 and it is now a subsidiary of International Airlines Group (IAG), the parent company of British Airways, Iberia and Vueling.

Aer Lingus Airlines Offers

The Aer Lingus Vacation Store is offering round-trip airfare to Dublin and manual car rental for a 6 to 14 night break!

Includes

  • Round-trip economy class airfare to London (LHR) and from Dublin (DUB)
  • 2 nights in London at the Dorsett Shepherd’s Bush (breakfast included) or similar
  • 2 nights in Dublin at the Ashling Hotel (breakfast included) or similar

Itinerary & Places to Visit

  • Visit London and Dublin and explore at your leisure.
  • Grab a pint at the famed Temple Bar in the heart of Dublin.
  • Maybe try and get a smirk from one of the guards at Buckingham Palace!
  • Enjoy city center accommodations in each destination, putting you in the middle of all the action!

For more details dial 800-495-1632.

View deal here
